attributes.action: Reduce inflation by reducing fuel duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Chancellor to reduce the ammount of fuel duty paid by U K Drivers and so reduce Inflation in this country.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Lower-fuel-duty/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
